alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:01AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Koochiching County through 1130 AM CDT... At 1101 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Baudette, to 10 miles west of Birchdale, to 21 miles north of Waskish, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Koochiching County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
